import "./postDetail.css" import { ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreHoriz, SentimentSatisfiedAlt, Favorite } from "@mui/icons-material"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {fetchPostDetail, getPosts, getPostsbyID, likePost} from "../../redux/postsSlice"; import PostAuthor from "./postAuthor"; import PostAvatar from "./postAvatar"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useAuth} from "../../hooks"; import TimeAgo from "./TimeAgo"; const PostDetail = () => { const auth = useAuth() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { postId } = useParams() const posts = useSelector(getPosts) useEffect(()=> { dispatch(fetchPostDetail({id: postId})) }, [postId]) if (!posts) { return null } let post = posts return (
